description.en: A crescent-shaped crossbody bag featuring a classic gingham pattern and adjustable strap for versatile carry. Compact yet roomy enough for phone, wallet, and daily essentials—great for casual outings and travel. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), pattern/color, strap spec, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 格纹弯月斜挎包，经典格纹元素，配可调节肩带，日常百搭。小巧但容量够用，可放手机、钱包与随身小物，适合休闲出行与旅行。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、花型配色、肩带规格、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Gingham fabric / Polyester / cotton-blend (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：格纹面料/涤纶/棉混纺（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
闭合方式：拉链闭合（可定制；可选 YKK）
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/配件（可定制）

en.Use Case: Daily carry, casual outings, travel organizer
en.Customization: Fabric/pattern, color, size, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 24–30cm × 高 16–20cm × 深 6–10cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、休闲出行、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料花型、配色尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
